sentences.en: Does the writer belong to the Impressionist school?
sentences.cn: 这位作家是否属于印象派?

sentences.en: Edgar Degas , French Impressionist painter and sculptor , was born in Paris.
sentences.cn: 法国印象派画家、雕刻家 埃德加·狄加 诞生于巴黎.

sentences.en: He assiduously acquired a fine collection of impressionist paintings.
sentences.cn: 他勤奋地收集了一套精美的印象派绘画.

sentences.en: He be a member of the french impressionist school.
sentences.cn: 他是法国印象派的一员.

sentences.en: He is a member of the French Impressionist school.
sentences.cn: 他是法国印象派的成员.

sentences.en: He was a post - impressionist painter whose early works somber, dark colors.
sentences.cn: 他的早期作品说明他是一名后印象派画家.

sentences.en: I prefer abstract art, although I like impressionist art too.
sentences.cn: 我偏爱抽象画, 不过我也喜欢印象派的画.

sentences.en: Impressionist painters broke away from traditional ideas about art.
sentences.cn: 印象派画家打破了传统的艺术观念.

sentences.en: Impressionist paintings are on exhibition at the art gallery.
sentences.cn: 美术馆正在举行印象派画展.

sentences.en: She is usually labelled ( as ) an Impressionist.
sentences.cn: 人们通常把她称为印象派艺术家.

sentences.en: Show of post - impressionist art, to see the work of the same artists.
sentences.cn: 纽约有幸在后期印象派艺术的“武库展览”中看到了那些画家的作品.

sentences.en: The collector has acquired a fine collection of impressionist paintings.
sentences.cn: 这位收藏家收集到大量印象派绘画.

sentences.en: The impressionist movement was one of the ancestors of abstract art.
sentences.cn: 印象主义运动是抽象艺术的鼻祖之一.

sentences.en: The impressionist was marvelous at taking off film stars and politicians.
sentences.cn: 那个摹仿演员极其擅长模仿影星和政治家.

sentences.en: This painting is a classic example of the French Impressionist style.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是法国印象派的经典之作.

words.tran_cn: 印象派的；印象主义的；给人深刻印象的
感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想
盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象

trans.tran_cn: 印象派画家，用滑稽方式模仿名流的人
trans.tran_en: someone who uses impressionism in the paintings or music that they produce
